name: Resort-like living in Williamsburg
locationDesc: Amazing Apt : 1 bdrm/1 bathroom furnished, New building with a doorman, jacuzzi, gym, pool, and roofdeck with an amazing Manhattan view.  Very good location : 4-Minutes walk to the L subway station, then Just 3 stops away from Manhattan.
spaceDesc: Amazing Apt : 1 bdrm/1 bathroom furnished, New building with a doorman, jacuzzi, gym, pool, and roofdeck with an amazing Manhattan view.  Very good location : 4-Minutes walk to the L subway station, then Just 3 stops away from Manhattan. Accept only reservation for minimum 3 nights.
notes: Accept only reservation for minimum 3 nights.

host.name: Nick
host.about: I am a buisnessman originally from Texas.  I have 30 years of experience in the American Real Estate Market. We specialize in local sales and property management

reviews.txt: Nick was very welcoming and helpful and ensured we had everything we needed for our stay.

This apatment is to much! Everything is brand new, high quality appliances and finishing touches. The apartment is very spacious, in a great location, the rooftop pool and terrace are great amenities.

Nicks apartment was a luxury escape in such a fabulous location in Madrid. The fit out is lovely with beautiful furniture and amenities and the roof top pool was such a wonderful addition in the heat. We also used the gym on multiple occasions which was a great touch. Thanks for having us!

Wonderful place with a beautiful Terrace in the best location of NYC. Nick was a perfect host, the Apartament was clean and perfectly equipped. It’s very recommendable and we will definitely come back. Thanks Nick for everything!
Very nicely located appartment right in the center across from a food market. The terrage was a real plus for a sunset drink. Overall we were super happy
Easiest check in and communication. We extended our stay by one night and was so simple to do due to quick responses from the host. The apartment was sparkly clean and very cosy!!!

name: UWS Brownstone Near Central Park
locationDesc: This spacious one bedroom apartment has a bonus space with two extra beds as well as a fold out sofa.  Close to the park, the subway, museums and restaurants.  This apartment is the perfect quiet getaway in the middle of Manhattan.
spaceDesc: This spacious one bedroom apartment has a bonus space with two extra beds as well as a fold out sofa.  Close to the park, the subway, museums and restaurants.  This apartment is the perfect quiet getaway in the middle of Manhattan. This charming one-bedroom apartment in a landmark brownstone townhouse in the Upper West Side area of Manhattan has high-ceilings, a fireplace and two planted, south-facing balconies overlooking a beautiful garden.  (The balcony off of the living room is about 5" X 8" and has a small table and two chairs where two people can have a nice meal.  The balcony off of the bedroom is about 5" X 14' and there is a chaise longue and a sitting chair, along with two side tables.  Both have outdoor lights, overlook a nice garden, and have plantings.)   There is a queen-sized bed in the private bedroom with closing door. There is also a very high quality full sized sofa bed in the living room.  This beautiful home is on an historic tree-lined block, between Central Park

host.name: Chas
host.about: We live in San Francisco and spend time in New York as well.  We also have another place in Northern California in the country we spend time at.  I'm a private pilot and Paul is quite an accomplished ceramicist, though he does non-profit management consulting by profession. I run a retreat center ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) and am a computer consultant some of the time and real estate investor other times.  We have a cat who stays at our house here in San Francisco when we travel.  She is very, very affectionate and easy to care for.

reviews.txt: We stayed in the brownstone for 4 nights and had a lovely time.  The apartment was spacious enough for us (a family of four) and the location was amazing.  You are steps to Central Park and to the 86th subway.  There are wonderful restaurants and shopping nearby if you need that but the small kitchen is fine for quick snacks and breakfast.  It was especially nice to sit on the little patio to eat my toast and tea and even with the NYC humming around you it is lovely to have an outdoor space.  Chas answered all my many questions with great patience and care...he really wanted us to have a wonderful time and went beyond the call of duty by even sending us links to good places to watch big soccer matches.  The apartment was clean when we arrived and had the basic things we needed such as towels and extra sheets.  While not the cheapest option on BNB it gave us all a wonderful bed to sleep in, space to spread out in when needed, and a fantastic location!  We even found street parking for the full 5 days!  Picking up the keys was a breeze and we left a few basic things for the next guests to enjoy from the corner store.   It is a gorgeous street to stay on and felt very safe. Thank you so much Chas!  We hope to return one day soon.

Our stay in New York at this apartment was vastly superior to staying at a hotel.  The location is perfect particularly for those wanting access to Central Park and the museum mile (Guggenheim etc) but it was also a revelation to explore that end of Broadway.  The apartment is lovely and has everything.  We especially appreciated the study nook and ability to use our laptop with wifi access and the well equipped kitchen for easy prep for meals (and deli close by makes it so easy to stock up).  The lounge, bedroom and bathroom are all in good, comfortable condition.  The little balconies and view of the courtyard topped it off.  A great experience and thoroughly recommend.

After a small glitch with the house keys, which was straightened out straight away, our stay was perfect. The apartment is lovely, in a great neighborhood and right by the subway. Even my husband. who is very picky, gave it a two thumbs up ! Our hosts were attentive and gracious over the emails and the whole thing was easy and pleasant. We'd definitaly book again.

It's hard to imagine a more authentic and enjoyable NYC experience than the one we had staying in this UWS apartment. There are so many details -- from the art on the walls to the spices in the kitchen -- that make it feel like a home away from home. The apartment is small but imminently comfortable with high ceilings and patios that make it feel spacious. The unit is off the street (on a courtyard)  so it was very quiet (that  and the comfortable bed made for great nights of sleeping). It's a beautiful street, just off Central Park and just around the corner from the subway. There are abundant restaurants within a 5 minute walk and the best coffee in NY (Joe's) is only about two blocks away. Chas was a great host who was quick to answer all our questions and make our stay as enjoyable as possible. We had our two sons with us (ages 10 and 12) and the living arrangements were ideal for a family our size. Thanks, Chas!

We just spent Christmas week at the apartment with our two daughters (aged 2.5 and 1). The space was well stocked and furnished and the location was perfect. It's not a huge apartment but the lofted ceilings give it a nice, open feel. Central Park, the subway, a convenience store, a wine store, and Starbucks are all within a block or two. When I first booked the reservation I was unsure about the process to get the keys, but it turns out I had no reason to be worried whatsoever. It was very easy and worked out well. Chas answered questions promptly and is a great host. We hope to be back soon!

A great experience - Chas was a good communicator so picking up the key went exactly as planned (a good thing for a first timer!), the apartment was just what we needed and the location (and quiet street) really were fabulous.

reviews.name: Cozy Art Top Floor Apt in PRIME Williamsburg!
reviews.locationDesc: My Apt it's right in the middle of the best and hot spots in the heart of REAL Williamsburg on Bedford Ave. Close to everything. 4 Subway stations (L/G/JMZ) around, same distance all! Very chill and cozy! 2 people only. No kids and pets please.
reviews.spaceDesc: My Apt it's right in the middle of the best and hot spots in the heart of REAL Williamsburg on Bedford Ave. Close to everything. 4 Subway stations (L/G/JMZ) around, same distance all! Very chill and cozy! 2 people only. No kids and pets please. Hi there! This is a cozy and impeccable one bedroom apartment in the heart of Williamsburg on North 1st Street.  One of the hippest and lively neighborhoods in New York City nowadays. Lots of intimate Cafes, Restaurants, Bars, Park, Discoteque, Concert Venues,  and the proximity to the East River gives it its special vibe.  As well as local Designer Stores, Vintage Stores, Apple Store, Whole Foods Supermarket, Sephora, Duane Reade, Food Town Supermarket, Martas Bakery, Maison Premiere, Domino Park, Urban Outfitters, Madewell, JC Crew, Music Hall of Williamsburg, Knitting Factory, Baby's All Right, Rough Trade, Brooklyn Steel, Yoga Studios, Pilates Studio, Spinning Studios, Equinox, Williamsburg Cinema, Nitehawk Cinema, Citi Bank, Citi Bikes, Ban

host.name: Ade
host.about: I'm a Photographer and I love music, travel and good food! I speak Spanish, Italian and English!

reviews.txt:
Adela's apartment is fantastic – perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg, very clean, nicely furnished and convenient.
Definitely one of the best New York apartments I stayed in recently.
Adela was very helpful and easy to communicate with.
Highly recommended!

Ade has an AWESOME apt in Williamsburg -- location is nuts, a reasonable price considering the location, and a great vibe.  Close to about everything in Williamsburg.

Wouldve stayed longer if i couldve.

Very nice Apt. in the hearth of Williamsburg and Bedford, wich is like the coolest place in Brooklyn, but in a very quiet and safety street. The apt, is in a 4th floor (no elevator) very clean and luminous.

You have two subway stations at 10'walk, and is really cool also if you want to bike the city.

Ade is really nice, will let everything ready for you and give some suggestions, se can speak Spanish too and in general all was as I expected, I would def. Recommend this place.
The apartment is nice (a bit small). Great location in Williamsburg. Nice bars and restaurants near by. 3 minutes from the subway

reviews.name: A large sunny bedroom
reviews.locationDesc: A large, sunny , affordable and very clean room in a fully renovated 2-bedroom apartment with only 2 mins walk to D train at Bronx.
reviews.spaceDesc: A large, sunny , affordable and very clean room in a fully renovated 2-bedroom apartment with only 2 mins walk to D train at Bronx.

host.name: Eddie
host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: My name is Eddie, i work in the show biz. Ilove Nyc and would love it if you would join me!

reviews.txt:
I had a fantastic stay. I didn't meet Eddie in person, but he did a great job of making sure his roommate took care of everything I needed and he was extremely hospitable. The place was especially clean, and the room was exactly as pictured and described. Note that there was a block party nearby, so there was some level of noise a couple nights, but it ended at reasonable hours.

I would DEFINITELY stay here again and recommend it to others.
Excellent accommodation in staying here. A very clean apartment with a friendly and helpful roommate. The bedroom was large, quiet and air conditioned :)

reviews.name: Luxury 1-Bdrm in Downtown Brooklyn
reviews.summary: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings.
reviews.house_rules: RESPECT IT & ENJOY IT! NO SMOKING -- this building, per the on-site management and the individual lease agreements, is a 100% SMOKE-FREE ZONE including both private and communal roof-top areas, the unit itself, and any other public areas within the building and the communal property regardless of whether inside or out. You must be totally off of the premises and on public property to smoke. If you're a regular smoker and feel you'll have a hard time following this rule, then we kindly suggest you look into another property. Evidence of smoking will result in a complete forfeit of your security deposit. NOISE: We have a zero-tolerance policy with noise complaints. We ask that you please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. QUIET HOURS are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM (week) and 11:00 PM to 9:00 AM (weekends). NO LARGE GATHERINGS/PARTIES VISITORS: We ask that all guests let us know in advance if you plan on having any visitors during your stay. We do ask that the number of visi

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm an executive at a wellness company in New York City. Educated in Fashion at Parsons, I'm into fitness and nutrition. I've lived in the city since enrolling at Parsons in the late 90s.

If you're looking for restaurant reservations, boutique fitness studios, or things to do in the city, then just let me know what you're interested in. I'd love to offer some suggestions and help you have a wonderful stay in New York City.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.summary: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings.
